channel.title: New, and or more smiles
channel.description:
I really don't care about animated or unneeded smiles as they may cause spam. But, I have seen these smiles on another forum, don't remember where, but. some of them just don't fit everything and some are just the wrong colo(r,ur) in my opinion. I just want some added ones, I know it isn't hard to do. And some may make some the same size if they wish to be submitted in. But, I kinda don't like the weird color they are given :rolleyes: [like]
:D :( :o ;D :eek: [/like]
so, do you think this will be an "okay" addition?

item.title: New, and or more smiles
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

Yeah I even saved them on my comp and use some for msn emotes.

Read full topic

item.title: New, and or more smiles
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:8, topic:84071”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=123498.msg1213020#msg1213020 date=1177474742]
Mopar can also easily make more smiley sets and give members the ability to switch between the sets.
[/quote]he can also easy totally ignore the request[/quote]

That is the easiest thing to do

I don’t see what is wrong with the current smilies.

Read full topic

item.title: New, and or more smiles
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:9, topic:84071”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=123498.msg1213020#msg1213020 date=1177474742]
Mopar can also easily make more smiley sets and give members the ability to switch between the sets.
[/quote]
Not really worth the time for something as trivial as smilies. =\ Besides, I’m quite fond of the current ones. :)[/quote]

As I am, but it really wouldn’t take much time. However, Mopar is uber busy and this very idea does not move the community forward at all, whatsoever.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321

@kloplop321 wrote:

yeah, that is where it is from. It is just that I want more with complex-er emotions or just more edgy. But, Simply, I just want more of them.

Read full topic

item.title: New, and or more smiles
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

:mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o

All of those are from vB forums, is probably from phpBB or something like that, and ;D was made by mopar.

It’s something to do with the moods why there coloured, yellow is a mellow, relaxed colour, so a smiley face such as would be yellow, purple/dark blue is cold and miserable, so is that colour, light blue/cyan is a chilled color, so : :eek: :rolleyes: are that color, green <- no idea, pink = embarrised, :P, :o, red = angry :mad:.

Read full topic
